name: Air hockey with black holes in outer space
name_original: Air hockey with black holes in outer space
description:
Can you get 30 points in this out of this world match?

The scales are high, but the friction is low (None, even).

If you have a friend, you can play with them, otherwise you can play against the CPU, it's ok, I got you covered.

Controls

Magenta Player:

  • W / A / S / D for movement
  • Q for taunting

Green Player:

  • I / J / K / L for movement
  • U for taunting
